config.title: Subscription Configuration
config.restrictUserAgentDescription: Enable access restrictions based on User-Agent
config.singleSubscriptionModeDescription: Limit users to one active subscription. Existing subscriptions unaffected
config.subscriptionDomainPlaceholder: Enter subscription domain, one per line
config.subscriptionPathDescription: Custom path for subscription endpoints (better performance after system restart)
config.userAgentWhitelistDescription: Allowed User-Agents for subscription access, one per line. Built-in templates are automatically included in the whitelist
config.userAgentWhitelistPlaceholder: Enter allowed User-Agents, one per line
config.wildcardResolutionDescription: Enable wildcard domain resolution for subscriptions
